title: Dispensing to Addicts and Habitual Users, and Treatment Programs
content:
Dispensing to Addicts and Habitual Users, and Treatment Programs

State Regulations
§ 80.84 - Practitioners and pharmacies; prescribing, administering and dispensing for the treatment of opioid use disorder
§ 80.85 - Administration of controlled substances to addicts and habitual users
§ 80.86 - Records and reports of treatment programs
§ 80.87 - Repealed
§ 80.88 - Repealed
§ 80.89 - Repealed
§ 80.90 - Repealed
§ 80.93 - Repealed
§ 80.94 - Repealed

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. § 80.84 - Practitioners and pharmacies; prescribing, administering and dispensing for the treatment of narcotic addiction
§ 80.85 - Administration of controlled substances to addicts and habitual users
